description:
Michael Kelly

Python and serverless technologies are a great way to quickly scale a project, but what can you do when things get complicated? Here are some patterns to keep you sane.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/orchestrating-complex-not-complicated-tasks-using-aws-serverless-and-python

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Sun Aug  4 14:50:00 2019 at C3.6
title: Orchestrating complex (not complicated) tasks using AWS serverless and Python
